Welcome to Balm Beats

Hi I'm Hayley Broder. Welcome to Balm Beats. Give a little background and where you tell everyone how awesome you are living in Vegas being a CB star, and what your blog is about and what Balm Beats means. Now I am just trying to fill space so it looks normal on this page. You can edit this however you want but I think it should be this long to look normal on the page. Surely you have this many things. Maybe you can say that you have a cat named Kizzy and he is black. And maybe that you are going to get married soon. And maybe that I miss you oodles of noodles. Rememeber that one time we did acid in golden gate park?
